summary: THE ENGINE ACCESS COVER IS HEAVY AND DOES NOT HAVE ANY LIFT SUPPORTS NOR DOES IT HAVE ANY WAY TO HOLD IT UP. THE MANUFACTURER EXPECTS THE OWNER TO CUT A BOARD TO PROP UNDER AND THEN WORK UNDERNEATH IT ON THE ENGINE. ONE BIG MOUSE TRAP IF THE STICK SLIPS YOU ARE CRIPPLED OR DEAD. *****DIMS 11 IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS*****769325.  *AK    *JB
